name: I NEED TO GET OUT OF THE BUNKER
name_original: I NEED TO GET OUT OF THE BUNKER
description:
In the year 2020 a virus infected the whole world, 
the country went to war. You survived in an unknown bunker full of traps. 
Explore and escape alive from this unknown place.
- Avoid the thorns and machinegun, they can kill you.
- Collect the 5 keys scattered around the Bunker to open the door and escape.
- Use the UP key to increase your speed or use the Down key to decrease your speed.
- This game was made to give you hate and try again and again, and again ...
**this game was used songs and effects from the site: https://opengameart.org/**
